creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
With Bitpanda you can invest in Bitcoin, gold and over 20 other digital assets on the go. Fast, secure and 24/7. Trusted by over 1 million users.

Bitpanda is all about ease of use. A simple verification process gives you access to an intuitive, fast and secure trading experience. Our fully automated platform provides both new and experienced users with complete control over their portfolio:

✔️ Buy, sell, swap or send Bitcoin, Ethereum, gold and over 20 other digital assets within minutes
✔️ Set up savings plans to regularly invest in digital assets and benefit from the cost average effect
✔️ Select from a wide range of payment and payout providers
✔️ Use EUR, CHF, GBP or USD to pay or cash out
✔️ Friendly and professional customer service


Bitpanda App Features


• Buy, sell and swap any supported cryptocurrency, from Bitcoin (BTC) to Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), and many more
• Set up as many savings plans as you want to conveniently buy Bitcoin and any other supported digital asset over time
• EUR, CHF, GBP and USD support
• Send digital assets to other Bitpanda users and to any email address in the world free of charge
• Optimised personal portfolio management system
• Personal contact list, which can be easily created and managed

Payment and Payout Methods


• SOFORT-Transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa / Mastercard) (payment only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY / EPS (payment only)
• Amazon.de Voucher (payout only)
• Bank Transfer
• Fiat Wallet (Euro, British Pound Sterling, US Dollar and Swiss Franc)
• Zimpler
• iDeal

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda is a fintech based in Vienna, Austria founded in 2014 by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer. The company is a firm believer in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digitised assets and blockchain technology. Bitpanda’s mission is to tear down the barriers to investing and bring traditional financial products to the 21st century. Today, Bitpanda has around 1 million users and more than 100 team members. With a PSD2 payment service provider license, state-of-the-art security and streamlined user experience, Bitpanda has grown into a popular trading platform for newbies and experts alike.

What are cryptocurrencies?
A cryptocurrency is a medium of exchange that is designed to work like a normal currency the only difference is that usually, cryptocurrencies use strong cryptography and a decentralised network that no one entity can control. There are literally thousands of currencies available and on Bitpanda you have access to some of the most popular ones: Bitcoin, Ethereum, IOTA, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin.

What is Bitcoin?
Bitcoin is the most popular cryptocurrency, both in terms of mainstream awareness as well as buy and sell volumes. It is based on an open source technology and operates with no central authority. This means, that nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can take part. Bitcoin was conceived in 2008 by a person or group going by the name Satoshi Nakamoto, who’s real identity is still unknown. Bitcoin’s supply is limited to a fixed number of 21.000.000 units.

What is Ethereum?
Ethereum is a second generation blockchain. It is a spiritual successor to the ideas and concepts introduced by Bitcoin. The goal of the project is to to create a decentralised and secure operating system for decentralised applications (dapps), which normally require a centralised middleman. Dapps are a tamper proof and secure way to record contracts and they are not controlled by an individual or a central entity. The native cryptocurrency running on the Ethereum blockchain is called Ether (ETH).
descriptionShort: Invest in Bitcoin, gold and over 20 other digital assets

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WHAT’S NEW

We continuously update our app to improve it for you. From making your experience more user-friendly, to security improvements to keep your data safe, we’ve got you covered.

- Claim BEST Rewards within the app
- The verification process has been simplified
- Onfido added as a new verification provider
- Various bug fixes and security improvements

Bitcoin was conceived in 2008 by a person or group going by the name Satoshi Nakamoto, who’s real identity is still unknown. Bitcoin’s supply is limited to a fixed number of 21.000.000 units.

What is Ethereum?
Ethereum is a second generation blockchain. It is a spiritual successor to the ideas and concepts introduced by Bitcoin. The goal of the project is to to create a decentralised and secure operating system for decentralised applications (dapps), which normally require a centralised middleman. Dapps are a tamper proof and secure way to record contracts and they are not controlled by an individual or a central entity. The native cryptocurrency running on the Ethereum blockchain is called Ether (ETH).
descriptionShort: Invest in Bitcoin, gold and over 30 other digital assets

A cryptocurrency is a medium of exchange that is designed to work like a normal currency the only difference is that usually, cryptocurrencies use strong cryptography and a decentralised network that no one entity can control. There are literally thousands of currencies available and on Bitpanda you have access to some of the most popular ones: Bitcoin, Ethereum, IOTA, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin.

What is Bitcoin?
Bitcoin is the most popular cryptocurrency, both in terms of mainstream awareness as well as buy and sell volumes. It is based on an open source technology and operates with no central authority. This means, that nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can take part. Bitcoin was conceived in 2008 by a person or group going by the name Satoshi Nakamoto, who’s real identity is still unknown. Bitcoin’s supply is limited to a fixed number of 21.000.000 units.

What is Ethereum?
Ethereum is a second generation blockchain. It is a spiritual successor to the ideas and concepts introduced by Bitcoin. The goal of the project is to to create a decentralised and secure operating system for decentralised applications (dapps), which normally require a centralised middleman. Dapps are a tamper proof and secure way to record contracts and they are not controlled by an individual or a central entity. The native cryptocurrency running on the Ethereum blockchain is called Ether (ETH).

Invest in your financial future and buy cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Pantos, IOTA, digitised gold and over 40 other digital assets on Bitpanda.

DOWNLOAD THE BITPANDA APP NOW


Bitpanda is all about ease of use. A simple verification process gives you access to an intuitive, fast and secure trading experience, suited for beginners and first-time traders.

Download the Bitpanda app and manage your personal investments in cryptocurrencies and precious metals, manage your portfolio, set a price alarm and start crypto trading.

INVESTING FOR EVERYONE


✔️ NEW: Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market and benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments)
✔️ Combine the Crypto Index of your choice with Bitpanda Savings for automated savings
✔️ Start crypto trading now with the Bitpanda Crypto Index from EUR 10 - for detailed information on the Bitpanda Crypto Index see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com

POPULAR Bitpanda Features
✔️ Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing at regular intervals in precious metals, cryptocurrencies and crypto indices
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange precious metals and cryptocurrencies 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM FOR BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED CRYPTO TRADERS


✔️ Free wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Multiple fiat currencies, including euro, Swiss franc, British pound and US dollar

TRADING APP FEATURES AT A GLANCE


• Optimised portfolio management
• Buy, sell and exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and many other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• EUR, CHF, GBP, and TRY supported
• Send cryptocurrencies FREE OF CHARGE to other Bitpanda users and to any email address
• Easily create and manage your personalised contact list

Payment and Payout Methods


• SOFORT-Transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Amazon.de Voucher (withdrawal only)
• Bank transfer
• Fiat Wallet (euro, Swiss franc, British pound sterling and US dollar)
• Zimpler
• iDeal

About Bitpanda


At Bitpanda, we firmly believe in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digital assets and blockchain technology. Bitpanda’s mission is to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies?


Cryptocurrencies are digital assets. They are used in technical applications, regarded as an investment and used as means of payment. Cryptocurrencies are secured by decentralised networks and ideally not controlled by any individual actors. There are thousands of cryptocurrencies in the market that have been programmed for a wide variety of use cases.

What is Bitcoin?


Bitcoin (BTC) is the most popular and best-known cryptocurrency with the highest trading volume. Bitcoin is based on cryptography in a peer-to-peer network without a central authority. This means that nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can participate.

What is Ethereum?


Ethereum is a second-generation blockchain based on the ideas and concepts of Bitcoin. The aim of Ethereum is to create a worldwide, decentralised and secure operating system by using digital contracts (smart contracts) and decentralised applications (DApps) to expand use cases for blockchains that traditionally required a central intermediary. The native cryptocurrency of the Ethereum blockchain is Ether (ETH).

About Bitpanda

At Bitpanda, we firmly believe in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digital assets, and blockchain technology. Bitpanda’s mission is to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies?

Cryptocurrencies are digital assets. They are used in technical applications, regarded as an investment, and used as means of payment. Cryptocurrencies are secured by decentralised networks and ideally not controlled by any individual actors. There are thousands of cryptocurrencies in the market that have been programmed for a wide variety of use cases.

What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin (BTC) is the most popular and best-known cryptocurrency with the highest trading volume. Bitcoin is based on cryptography in a peer-to-peer network without a central authority. This means that nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can participate.

What is Ethereum?

Ethereum is a second-generation blockchain based on the ideas and concepts of Bitcoin. The aim of Ethereum is to create a worldwide, decentralised and secure operating system by using digital contracts (smart contracts) and decentralised applications (DApps) to expand use cases for blockchains that traditionally required a central intermediary. The native cryptocurrency of the Ethereum blockchain is Ether (ETH).

Invest in your financial future and buy cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, digitised gold and over 50 other digital assets on Bitpanda. Use your Bitpanda Card to spend your investments like cash. Buy coffee with Bitcoin or renew your Netflix subscription with gold. Pay any way you want. Instantly. Anywhere.

📥 Download the Bitpanda app now

Bitpanda is all about ease of use. A simple verification process gives you access to an intuitive, fast and secure trading experience, suited for beginners and first-time traders.

Keep track of your trades in real time with the Bitpanda App. Access your payment history and keep an overview of your cashback rewards.

The Bitpanda Card is a Visa debit card. Use it with Google Pay or Samsung Pay and spend your assets 24/7, wherever you are. Find out more and order your free crypto card on bitpanda.com.

Download the Bitpanda app and manage your personal investments in cryptocurrencies and precious metals, manage your portfolio, set a price alarm and start crypto trading.

💳 Spend your assets

NEW: The Bitpanda Card
✔️Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitpanda portfolio, making your investments instantly spendable without topping up ever.
✔️ Connect any asset you want to the card using the Bitpanda App.
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card - anywhere you see a Visa logo.

⭐ Popular Bitpanda Features

✔️ Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in precious metals, cryptocurrencies and crypto indices at regular intervals
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange precious metals and cryptocurrencies 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)

🔐 Secure and regulated trading platform for beginners and experienced crypto traders

✔️ Free wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Multiple fiat currencies, including euro, Swiss franc, British pound and US dollar

✨ Trading app features at a glance

• Optimised portfolio management
• Buy, sell and exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and many other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• EUR, CHF, USD, GBP, and TRY supported
• Send cryptocurrencies to other Bitpanda users FREE OF CHARGE
• Easily create and manage your personalised contact list

💵 Payment and Payout Methods

• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• Fiat wallet (euro, Swiss franc, British pound sterling and US dollar)
• iDeal

About Bitpanda

At Bitpanda, we firmly believe in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digital assets, and blockchain technology. Bitpanda’s mission is to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies?

Cryptocurrencies are digital assets. They are used in technical applications, regarded as investment and used as means of payment. Cryptocurrencies are secured by decentralised networks and ideally not controlled by any individual actors.

What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin (BTC) is the most popular cryptocurrency with the highest trading volume. Bitcoin is based on cryptography in a peer-to-peer network without a central authority. Nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can participate.

What is Ethereum?

Ethereum with its cryptocurrency Ether is a second-generation blockchain based on the ideas and concepts of Bitcoin. The aim of Ethereum is to create a worldwide, decentralised and secure operating system by using digital contracts (smart contracts) and decentralised applications (DApps).
descriptionShort: Invest in Bitcoin, trade cryptocurrencies, buy gold, pay with your Bitpanda Card

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW - The Bitpanda Card: Spend crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card - anywhere you see a Visa logo.
We continuously update our app to improve it for you. From making your experience more user-friendly, to security improvements to keep your data safe, we’ve got you covered.
- Performance improvements
- General improvements & bug fixes

About Bitpanda

At Bitpanda, we firmly believe in the innovative power of cryptocurrencies, digital assets, and blockchain technology. Bitpanda’s mission is to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies?

Cryptocurrencies are digital assets. They are used in technical applications, regarded as investment and used as means of payment. Cryptocurrencies are secured by decentralised networks and ideally not controlled by any individual actors.

What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin (BTC) is the most popular cryptocurrency with the highest trading volume. Bitcoin is based on cryptography in a peer-to-peer network without a central authority. Nobody owns or controls the network and everyone can participate.

What is Ethereum?

Ethereum with its cryptocurrency Ether is a second-generation blockchain based on the ideas and concepts of Bitcoin. The aim of Ethereum is to create a worldwide, decentralised and secure operating system by using digital contracts (smart contracts) and decentralised applications (DApps).

title: Bitpanda: Bitcoin wallet and crypto card

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to invest with a small budget but are unsure of how to start? Whether you want to buy Bitcoin, start investing in the stock market, or save gold regularly, use the Bitpanda App for your finances, all in one place.

INVESTING IS FOR EVERYONE


The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin, invest in stocks or ETFs and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes. *For detailed information on some of these assets, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com.*

INVESTMENT APP FOR BEGINNERS and seasoned investors alike


Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your personal investments in cryptocurrencies, stocks, ETFs and precious metals, set price alarms and start investing at any time.

⭐ Popular Bitpanda Features

✔️ Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in precious metals, cryptocurrencies and crypto indices at regular intervals
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange precious metals and cryptocurrencies 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)
✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market and benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings - for detailed information on the Bitpanda Crypto Index, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com

🚀 NEW! EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS


✔️ Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks
✔️ Fractional stocks such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
✔️ Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

💳 SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH

The Bitpanda Card
✔️ Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitpanda portfolio, making your investments instantly spendable without topping up ever.
✔️ Connect any asset you want to the card using the Bitpanda App.
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card

🔐 Secure and regulated trading platform for beginners and experienced crypto traders

✔️ Free wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Multiple fiat currencies

✨ Trading app features at a glance

• Buy, sell and exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and many other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• EUR, CHF, USD, GBP, and TRY supported
• Send cryptocurrencies to other Bitpanda users FREE OF CHARGE
• Easily create and manage your personalised contact list

💵 Payment and Payout Methods

• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• Fiat wallet (euro, Swiss franc, British pound sterling and US dollar)
• iDeal

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria, founded in 2014 by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria, founded in 2014 by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).

title: Bitpanda: Invest in crypto, stocks and ETFs

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to invest with a small budget but are unsure of how to start? Whether you want to buy Bitcoin, start investing in the stock market, or save gold regularly, use the Bitpanda App for your finances, all in one place.

INVESTING IS FOR EVERYONE


The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin, invest in stocks or ETFs and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes. *For detailed information on some of these assets, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com.*

INVESTMENT APP FOR BEGINNERS and seasoned investors alike


Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your personal investments in cryptocurrencies, stocks, ETFs and precious metals, set price alarms and start investing at any time.

⭐ Popular Bitpanda Features

✔️ Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in precious metals, cryptocurrencies and crypto indices at regular intervals
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange precious metals and cryptocurrencies 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)
✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market and benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings - for detailed information on the Bitpanda Crypto Index, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com

🚀 NEW! EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS


✔️ Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks
✔️ Fractional stocks such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
✔️ Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

💳 SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH

The Bitpanda Card
✔️ Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitpanda portfolio, making your investments instantly spendable without topping up ever.
✔️ Connect any asset you want to the card using the Bitpanda App.
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card

🔐 Secure and regulated trading platform for beginners and experienced crypto traders

✔️ Free wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Multiple fiat currencies

✨ Trading app features at a glance

• Buy, sell and exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and many other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• EUR, CHF, USD, GBP, and TRY supported
• Send cryptocurrencies to other Bitpanda users FREE OF CHARGE
• Easily create and manage your personalised contact list

💵 Payment and Payout Methods

• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• Fiat wallet (euro, Swiss franc, British pound sterling and US dollar)
• iDeal

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria, founded in 2014 by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).

The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin, invest in stocks or ETFs and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. *For detailed information on some of these assets, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com.*

INVESTMENT APP FOR BEGINNERS and seasoned investors alike


Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs.

You can check, keep track of and manage your personal investments in cryptocurrencies, stocks, ETFs and precious metals, set price alarms and start investing at any time.

⭐ Popular Bitpanda Features

✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market and benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings - for detailed information on the Bitpanda Crypto Index, see the published prospectus on bitpanda.com
✔️ Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in precious metals, cryptocurrencies and crypto indices at regular intervals
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange precious metals and cryptocurrencies 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)

🚀 EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET 24/7 WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS


✔️ Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks and ETFs
✔️ Fractional stocks such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
✔️ Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

💳 SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH

The Bitpanda Card
✔️ Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitpanda portfolio, making your investments instantly spendable without topping up ever.
✔️ Connect any asset you want to the card using the Bitpanda App.
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card

✨ Trading app features at a glance

• Secure and regulated platform for beginners and experienced investors
• Optimised management of your investments
• Buy, sell and exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Dogecoin (DOGE), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and many other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• EUR, CHF, USD, GBP, and TRY fiat currencies supported
• Send cryptocurrencies to other Bitpanda users FREE OF CHARGE
• Easily create and manage your personalised contact list
• Free wallet service included

💵 Payment and Payout Methods

• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• Fiat wallet (euro, Swiss franc, British pound sterling and US dollar)
• iDeal

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria, founded in 2014 by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).

title: Bitpanda: Buy bitcoin securely

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether you want to buy Bitcoin with a small budget, start investing in the stock market or to save gold regularly, use the Bitpanda App for your finances, all in one place.

INVESTING IS FOR EVERYONE
The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin and any cryptocurrency and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes.*

CRYPTO APP FOR BEGINNERS
Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your investments in crypto, stocks*, ETFs* and precious metals at any time, with more assets being added consistently.

POPULAR ON BITPANDA
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange cryptocurrencies and precious metals 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)
✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)*
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market, benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings -

✔️Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in BTC, Ethereum, other cryptocurrencies and precious metals at regular intervals

SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH
✔️ The Bitpanda Card
Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitcoin wallet, making your investments instantly spendable without ever topping up
✔️ Connect any asset to the card using the Bitpanda App
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card - anywhere you see a Visa logo

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM FOR BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED INVESTORS
✔️ Free Bitcoin wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Fiat currencies (euro, Swiss franc, British pound and US dollar)

EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS*
- Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks*
- Fractional stocks* such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
- Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

Bitpanda App Features
TRADING APP FEATURES AT A GLANCE
• Selection of your top favourite cryptos
• Scan the market with our top movers
• Set price alarms
• Optimised management of your investments
• Buy, sell and swap Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Dogecoin (DOGE), SHIBA INU (SHIB), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• Create and manage your personalised contact list

Payment and Payout Methods
• SEPA Instant deposit
• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• iDeal

*For more information on the Bitpanda Crypto Indices, Bitpanda Stocks and ETFs, please refer to the respective prospectus and the PRIIPs Key Information Documents (KIDs) on bitpanda.com - Bitpanda Stocks are contracts replicating an underlying stock or ETF.

title: Bitpanda: Buy bitcoin securely

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Whether you want to buy Bitcoin with a small budget, start investing in the stock market or to save gold regularly, use the Bitpanda App for your finances, all in one place.

INVESTING IS FOR EVERYONE
The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin and any cryptocurrency and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes.*

CRYPTO APP FOR BEGINNERS
Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your investments in crypto, stocks*, ETFs* and precious metals at any time, with more assets being added consistently.

POPULAR ON BITPANDA
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange cryptocurrencies and precious metals 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)
✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)*
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market, benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings -

✔️Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in BTC, Ethereum, other cryptocurrencies and precious metals at regular intervals

SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH
✔️ The Bitpanda Card
Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitcoin wallet, making your investments instantly spendable without ever topping up
✔️ Connect any asset to the card using the Bitpanda App
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card - anywhere you see a Visa logo

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM FOR BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED INVESTORS
✔️ Free Bitcoin wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Fiat currencies (euro, Swiss franc, British pound and US dollar)

EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS*
- Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks*
- Fractional stocks* such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
- Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

Bitpanda App Features
TRADING APP FEATURES AT A GLANCE
• Selection of your top favourite cryptos
• Scan the market with our top movers
• Set price alarms
• Optimised management of your investments
• Buy, sell and swap Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Dogecoin (DOGE), SHIBA INU (SHIB), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• Create and manage your personalised contact list

Payment and Payout Methods
• SEPA Instant deposit
• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• iDeal

*For more information on the Bitpanda Crypto Indices, Bitpanda Stocks and ETFs, please refer to the respective prospectus and the PRIIPs Key Information Documents (KIDs) on bitpanda.com - Bitpanda Stocks are contracts replicating an underlying stock or ETF.

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).

Whether you want to buy Bitcoin with a small budget, start investing in the stock market or to save gold regularly, use the Bitpanda App for your finances, all in one place.

INVESTING IS FOR EVERYONE
The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin and any cryptocurrency and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes.*

CRYPTO APP FOR BEGINNERS
Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your investments in crypto, stocks*, ETFs* and precious metals at any time, with more assets being added consistently.

POPULAR ON BITPANDA
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange cryptocurrencies and precious metals 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)
✔️ Bitpanda Crypto Index (BCI)*
Invest in the top 5, top 10 or top 25 cryptocurrencies traded on the market, benefit from automatic portfolio rebalancing (weighting adjustments) and set up automated savings with Bitpanda Savings -

✔️Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in BTC, Ethereum, other cryptocurrencies and precious metals at regular intervals

SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH
✔️ The Bitpanda Card
Free Visa debit card, connected to your Bitcoin wallet, making your investments instantly spendable without ever topping up
✔️ Connect any asset to the card using the Bitpanda App
✔️ Spend your crypto, metals or any other asset with a tap of a card - anywhere you see a Visa logo

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM FOR BEGINNERS AND EXPERIENCED INVESTORS
✔️ Free Bitcoin wallet service included
✔️ Fast and reliable, around the clock, 7 days a week
✔️ Fiat currencies (euro, Swiss franc, British pound and US dollar)

EXPLORE THE STOCK MARKET WITH FRACTIONAL STOCKS*
- Invest in small slices of your favourite stocks*
- Fractional stocks* such as Tesla, Apple and Amazon
- Commission-free investing and tight spreads, 24/7 available

Bitpanda App Features
TRADING APP FEATURES AT A GLANCE
• Selection of your top favourite cryptos
• Scan the market with our top movers
• Set price alarms
• Optimised management of your investments
• Buy, sell and swap Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Pantos (PAN), Dogecoin (DOGE), SHIBA INU (SHIB), IOTA (MIOTA), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA) and other coins on our cryptocurrency platform
• Create and manage your personalised contact list

Payment and Payout Methods
• SEPA Instant deposit
• SOFORT transfer (available in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland)
• Credit Card (Visa/Mastercard) (deposits only)
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• Bank transfer
• iDeal

*For more information on the Bitpanda Crypto Indices, Bitpanda Stocks and ETFs, please refer to the respective prospectus and the PRIIPs Key Information Documents (KIDs) on bitpanda.com - Bitpanda Stocks are contracts replicating an underlying stock or ETF.

About Bitpanda
Bitpanda GmbH is a successful fintech company based in Vienna, Austria to tear down the barriers to investing and personal finance through digital assets and blockchain technology like cryptocurrencies, precious metals, fractional stocks and ETFs and to bring traditional financial products into the 21st century.

What are cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum?
Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. They are secured in decentralised networks, not controlled by any individual actors and are used in technical applications and as means of payment. Transactions are recorded in blockchains. The most popular cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH).
descriptionShort: Invest in Ethereum, manage your Bitcoin wallet using your Bitpanda App

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* More assets than ever to choose from *
* Hold BEST, claim rewards *
Discover our updated Bitpanda Loyalty Programme and soon reap the benefits from:
- New and easier to reach VIP levels
- Monthly token burns, reducing the BEST supply faster than ever before
We continuously update our app to improve it for you. From making your experience more user-friendly, to security improvements to keep your data safe, we’ve got you covered.
- Performance improvements
- General improvements & bug fixes

SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH

Cryptocurrencies are digital assets regarded as investment. The Bitpanda App offers you an easy way to buy Bitcoin and any cryptocurrency and a fast, intuitive and secure trading experience no matter your budget. Register your Bitpanda account and complete our trusted verification process in just a few minutes.*

CRYPTO APP FOR BEGINNERS
Whether you are a beginner to trading, have been investing for a while or if you are a seasoned investor, the Bitpanda App is easy to use and meets all your investment needs. You can check, keep track of and manage your investments in crypto, stocks*, ETFs* and precious metals at any time, with more assets being added consistently.

POPULAR ON BITPANDA
✔️ Buy, sell and exchange cryptocurrencies and precious metals 24/7 with a minimum amount of EUR 1 (*from EUR 10 for crypto index products)

✔️Bitpanda Savings for stress-free investing in BTC, Ethereum, other cryptocurrencies and precious metals at regular intervals

SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH

title:
Bitpanda: Buy Bitcoin securely
2.73.0

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
INVEST IN CRYPTO WITH BITPANDA
The Bitpanda app is a simple way to invest in cryptocurrency, offering a fast and secure trading experience, 24/7. Download the app and complete our verification process in just a few minutes.* When you’re ready, you can start investing from just €1.

Invest in over 3,000 digital assets across crypto, crypto indices*, stocks and ETFs*, gold and commodities.

Whether you want to buy Bitcoin, trade stocks* or invest in gold, Bitpanda is the trusted investment app for managing your digital assets.


You can buy, sell, and swap more than 400+ cryptocurrencies including:

◼Bitcoin (BTC)
◼Ethereum (ETH)
◼Cardano (ADA)
◼Shiba Inu (SHIB)
◼Dogecoin (DOGE)
◼Ripple (XRP)
◼Solana (SOL)

BITPANDA APP FEATURES
◼Trade 24/7
◼No deposit and withdrawal fees
◼Earn weekly rewards with Bitpanda Staking
◼Go long or short on top cryptocurrencies with Bitpanda Leverage, including Bitcoin, Ethereum and over 10 other leveraged positions
◼Secure your assets with our crypto wallet
◼Set price alerts
◼Explore the market and explore the top movers
◼More than 10 fiat currencies are available including EUR, CHF, USD, GBP and PLN
◼Exclusive crypto indices* (BCIs): Auto-invest in the top 5, 10, and 25 cryptocurrencies on the market

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM
The safety of our customer’s assets is our top priority. Here’s how we do it:

◼Asset protection - Crypto assets are stored in highly secure cold storage facilities examined by an external auditor
◼Best-in-class security - ISO 27001 certification and SOC 2 compliant
◼Regulations and licences - 12 key European licences & registrations

WIDE RANGE OF DIGITAL ASSETS
Anyone can invest with Bitpanda, whether you’re a beginner starting to build your portfolio or a seasoned trader, we meet all your investing needs.

◼Cryptocurrencies - buy, sell, swap or hold over 400 cryptos from Bitcoin to Bonk
◼Invest in stocks* and ETFs* including popular companies like Apple, Tesla, Amazon and more
◼Invest in your choice of precious metals - gold, silver, platinum or palladium
◼Explore the commodities market including oil, gas, wheat, copper, and nickel - with more available

STAKE AND LEVERAGE YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS
◼Start staking your coins and tokens with Bitpanda Staking to earn weekly rewards. Choose from 40 crypto assets including ETH, ADA, and SOL
◼Bitpanda Leverage allows you to trade on a short-term horizon with low trading fees. Get 10+ leveraged positions with exposure to Bitcoin, Ethereum and the other top cryptocurrencies

CREATE YOUR PERSONAL SAVINGS PLANS
Set up automated investments in crypto, stocks*, crypto indices* or precious metals. With a Bitpanda Savings Plan, you can create and manage your investments on the go.

DEPOSIT AND PAYOUT METHODS
Bitpanda offers no deposit or withdrawal fees across all payment methods, including credit cards, so you can invest on the go, 24/7.

◼SEPA instant deposit
◼Bank transfer
◼PayPal
◼Credit card (Visa/Mastercard - deposits only)
◼SOFORT transfer
◼NETELLER
◼Skrill
◼GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
◼iDeal

THE BITPANDA CARD: SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH
With this free Visa debit card, you can spend your assets with a simple tap. Connect any digital asset like crypto or metals to your Bitpanda Card via the app.

◼Switch between multiple payment assets
◼Accepted by 54m+ Visa merchants in 200+ countries
◼Backed by Visa security and fraud prevention

title:
Bitpanda: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
2.96.2

creator: Bitpanda GmbH
descriptionHtml:
INVEST IN CRYPTO WITH BITPANDA
The Bitpanda app is a simple way to invest in cryptocurrency, offering a fast and secure trading experience, 24/7. Download the app and complete our verification process in just a few minutes.* When you’re ready, you can start investing from just €1.

Invest in over 3,000 digital assets across crypto, crypto indices*, stocks and ETFs* and commodities.

Whether you want to buy Bitcoin, trade stocks* or invest in commodities, Bitpanda is the trusted investment app for managing your digital assets.

You can buy, sell, and swap more than 600+ cryptocurrencies including:

• Bitcoin (BTC)
• Ethereum (ETH)
• Cardano (ADA)
• Shiba Inu (SHIB)
• Dogecoin (DOGE)
• Ripple (XRP)
• Solana (SOL)

BITPANDA APP FEATURES
• Trade 24/7
• No deposit and withdrawal fees
• Earn weekly rewards with Bitpanda Staking
• Go long or short on top cryptocurrencies with Bitpanda Leverage, including Bitcoin, Ethereum and over 10 other leveraged positions
• Secure your assets with our crypto wallet
• Set price alerts
• Explore the market and explore the top movers
• More than 10 fiat currencies are available including EUR, CHF, USD, GBP and PLN
• Crypto indices* (BCIs): Auto-invest in the top 5, 10, and 25 cryptocurrencies on the market

SECURE AND REGULATED TRADING PLATFORM
The safety of our customer’s assets is our top priority. Here’s how we do it:

• Asset protection - Crypto assets are stored in highly secure cold storage facilities examined by an external auditor
• Best-in-class security - ISO 27001 certification and SOC 2 compliant
• Regulations and licences - 12 key European licences & registrations

WIDE RANGE OF DIGITAL ASSETS
Anyone can invest with Bitpanda, whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned trader, we meet all your investing needs.

• Cryptocurrencies - buy, sell, swap or hold over 600 cryptos from Bitcoin to Bonk
• Invest in stocks* and ETFs* including popular companies like Apple, Tesla, Amazon and more
• Explore the commodities market including oil, gas, wheat, copper, and nickel - with more available

STAKE AND LEVERAGE YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS
• Start staking your coins and tokens with Bitpanda Staking to earn weekly rewards. Choose from 40 crypto assets including ETH, ADA, and SOL
• Bitpanda Leverage allows you to trade on a short-term horizon with low trading fees. Get 10+ leveraged positions with exposure to Bitcoin, Ethereum and other cryptocurrencies

CREATE YOUR PERSONAL SAVINGS PLANS
Set up automated investments in crypto, stocks*, crypto indices* or commodities. With a Bitpanda Savings Plan, you can create and manage your investments on the go.

DEPOSIT AND PAYOUT METHODS
Bitpanda offers no deposit or withdrawal fees across all payment methods, including credit cards, so you can invest on the go, 24/7.

• SEPA instant deposit
• Bank transfer
• PayPal
• Credit card (Visa/Mastercard - deposits only)
• SOFORT transfer
• NETELLER
• Skrill
• GIROPAY/EPS (deposits only)
• iDeal

THE BITPANDA CARD: SPEND YOUR ASSETS LIKE CASH
With this free Visa debit card, you can spend your assets with a simple tap. Connect any asset like crypto or metals to your Bitpanda Card via the app.

• Switch between multiple assets
• Accepted by 54m+ Visa merchants in 200+ countries
• Backed by Visa security and fraud prevention

* Investing in crypto-assets carries risk. You could sustain a loss of some or all of your investment.

Stocks and ETFs are underlying assets of the contracts offered as Bitpanda Stocks and are brought to you by Bitpanda Financial Services. For more information consult the prospectus at bitpanda.com. Capital at risk.

For more information about the Bitpanda Crypto Indices, including a detailed description of the product, the issuer and the risks, please download, read and analyse the prospectus at bitpanda.com.
